p: The AHC analysis showed that the examined samples can be clustered into 5 groups: (1) Egyptian samples of the stem, leaf, fruit, and flower collected from Nasr City, (2) Nigerian leaf sample collected from Riji, (3) present Egyptian samples and Nigerian leaf sample collected from the market, (4) Saudi sample, and (5) Indian sample ( Figure 2b). The variation among different samples could be ascribed to the variation in the climatic and edaphic conditions as well as the difference in the genetic pool [ 32, 45].
